name: Ninja Sling
description:
Ninja Sling!

Make your way through the pillars and land each jump. Don't overshoot or you will fall to your doom! Test your skills to reach the top and see how far you can go.

Game play is simple but challenging.

Short press and release to jump short.

Long press and release to jump far.

Land your jump and gain points.

Ninja skills require years of intense training!
